amendment.description: Regarding property taxes, owed by foreign countries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3699 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3699 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S9588-9592; text: CR S9590) Regarding property taxes, owed by foreign countries.
